item.title: 15 people...not one smart enough to help me?
item.dc:creator: @Taylor_John0 Taylor John0
item.description:
@Taylor_John0 wrote:

I’ve been at this for days, getting little help. Mostly views.

I added this:

else if(useItemID == 440 && (atObjectID == 2781 || atObjectID == 11666)) { sendFrame164(2400); }
Smelting with iron.
But when the interface shows up, nothing happens when you click the iron bar, right or left.
So I added this under case 185:

case 3991: { closeInterface(); setAnimation(899); deleteItem(440, getItemSlot(440), 1); addItem(2351, 1); addSkillXP(25, 13); } break;
And it STILL didn’t work.
Please help me with this, thanks.

Read full topic
item.source: 15 people...not one smart enough to help me?
